title: [Health] Too much self-confidence can endanger health. Older people who overestimate their health go to the doctor less often. This can have serious consequences, when illnesses are detected too late. By contrast, people who think they are sicker than they actually are visit the doctor more often.

[Health] Scientists have found mothers who had experienced high stress levels, like worries, loss of joy or tension, during pregnancy were also more likely to report the occurrence of behavioural problems when their children were seven, eight or ten years old
